snippet: A man who was illegally drag racing has been charged with second-degree murder after his Ford Mustang hit spectators gathered late Sunday in Middlesex, killing four people.
lead_paragraph: A man who was illegally drag racing has been charged with second-degree murder after his Ford Mustang hit spectators gathered late Sunday in Middlesex, killing four people.

headline.main: North Carolina: 4 Bystanders Killed as a Car in a Drag Race Crashes
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: 4 Bystanders Killed as a Car In a Drag Race Crashes
